tab1.text1:
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Discord</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Join the Discord using the 'join' link below or alternatively via</>
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">discord.gg/hyZPVAVSnn</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">First Time?</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Before diving in, please take a moment to familiarize yourself with our community rules and conduct. You can find our rules and settings on this UI, but for a more comprehensive set, please see our Discord.</>


<TextStyle.Yellow>ABOUT THIS SERVER</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">What is this place?</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">ODYSSEY offers our version of a balanced, long-term experience with slightly increased stats for rewarding gameplay without the excessive grind of official servers.  50x enjoyers - this isn't for you.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Mods</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">We've added some mods to further expand on the experience. We only introduce immersive mods that feel like they should belong in the game. You won't find OP gamebreaking mods here! These mods are reviewed constantly to ensure any mod author updates don't bring in anything we don't want around.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Community</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">We aim to foster a nice community of players who get along with each other, trade and otherwise thrive through collaboration.. or keep to yourself, it's your choice! Either way we want you to feel at home. We do not tolerate bad actors who cause excessive trouble, so you have been warned!</>
tab1.text3: <RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- No events announced to date</>

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.White>General</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- No griefing, trolling or harrassment towards strangers.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- No player-killing.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- No begging for dinos/armour/weapons/resources.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- No Racism, sexism, homophobia or other discrimination.</>

<TextStyle.White>Evidence</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">We require evidence before we can act, preferrably video clips. These can be discreetly submitted via Discord.</>
tab2.text2:
<TextStyle.White>General</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- One (1) base per map.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- Your base size must be within your requirements.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- Your base must have a permiter wall.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- Your base cannot block a major resource spot.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- Your base cannot prevent rare dino spawns.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- Your base cannot block a note or artifact.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- Your base cannot block a route or pathway.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- You cannot build near an Obelisk.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- You must not build near another tribe without permission.</>

<TextStyle.White>Beach Bases</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Beach areas are spawn points for new players. Beach bases are required to have an unlocked door on your perimeter wall to allow players to exit your base.</>

<TextStyle.White>Build Exclusions</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">You cannot build on the following areas:</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- Metal Mountain(s)</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- Volcano</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- Carnivore Island</>

<TextStyle.White>Exceptions to Territory Size</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Exemptions to territory size is granted for special landmarks.  Examples include, but not limited to, The Hidden Lake, Herbivore Island and the ice islands to the NNW.</>

<TextStyle.White>Leave No Trace</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Clear temporary structures i.e. dino traps.  You can pick up placed structures at any time - there is no  excuse for leaving things behind. Unlocking them to allow others to use is not allowed.</>

<TextStyle.White>No Blocking / Claiming Land</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">You may not place foundations or pillars to claim land for later development.  Similarly you cannot prevent a players further base expansion on a pre-existing player base, nor can you block someone from building in a particular spot.</>

<TextStyle.White>Moving Base</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">If you wish to move base, you may build a new one prior to moving.  You must remove the old one ASAP (preferably within 24h).</>
tab2.text3:
<TextStyle.White>Tame Limit</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- 75 online/30 offline.</>

<TextStyle.White>Abandoned</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Your dinos are your responsibility. The game allows you to track dinos so there is no excuse for lost tames. Any dinos found outside your base perimeter and not in your control will be removed.</>

<TextStyle.White>Leaving Dinos at Obelisks</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Leaving tames at obelisks is prohibited. These areas must be kept accessible for everyone at all times. Tames located there with no tribe presence, or no tribe member responding in char will result in all being killed.</>

<TextStyle.White>Offline Breeding</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Offline breeding is not allowed. This must be disabled before you log off. Failure to do so may result in the female being killed. Reports for offline breeding will be actioned if the player has been offline for a while and there is a large build up of babies or eggs.</>
